meanings.definition: A person who collects or sells resin.
meanings.sent1: The rosinier gathered resin from the trees in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The rosinier set up a small shop to sell the resin he collected.
meanings.sent3: The rosinier accidentally mistook honey for resin and tried to sell it at the market.
meanings.sent4: The rosinier's dedication to collecting resin was as strong as the trees themselves.
meanings.sent5: The rosinier's hands were always sticky from handling resin all day.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the collection or sale of resin.
meanings.sent1: The rosinier tools were specifically designed for handling resin.
meanings.sent2: The rosinier market was bustling with buyers looking for quality resin products.
meanings.sent3: The rosinier festival celebrated all things resin-related, from collection to sale.
meanings.sent4: The rosinier scent of pine filled the air in the resin forest.
meanings.sent5: The rosinier craftsmanship of the resin products was unmatched in the region.
